隞字的基本解释

隞
áo
古地名。中国商代仲丁的都城，在今河南省荥阳县东北敖山南面。

隞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［áo］
［《集韻》牛刀切，平，疑。］
古地名。商中丁都城。在今河南省荥阳县东北敖山南。

隞字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【阜字部】　隞； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1360第06
【集韻】牛刀切，音鏊。地名。【史記·殷本紀】仲丁遷于隞。【集韻】通作敖囂。

隞字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
隞字的起名意思

暂无。

Xian
Basic explanation of words
Xian
áo
Ancient place names. The capital of Zhongding in the Shang Dynasty of China was south of Aoshan in the northeast of Xingyang County, Henan Province.
Xian
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [áo]
["Jiyun" cuts with a sharp knife, flat, suspicious. ]
Ancient place names. Shangzhong Dingducheng. In today's Henan Province, Xingyang County, northeast of Aoshannan.
Xian
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【Fu Character Department】　隞; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1360 Page 06
[Jiyun] Cut with a knife, sound flick. Place name. 【Historical Records·Yin Benji】Zhong Ding moved to Yan. [Ji Yun] Tong Zuo Ao Xiao.
